sen.j: 白川通（しらかわどおり）は、京都市の主要な南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Shirakawa-dori Street is one of the north-south running streets of Kyoto city.
The Shirakawa-dori Street is a street running north-south through Kyoto city.
The Shirakawa-dori Street is a street running north-south through Kyoto city.

sen.j: 東大路通よりさらに東にあり、北は宝ヶ池通から南は仁王門通（南禅寺前）まで。
sen.e: It runs farther east than the Higashioji-dori Street, extending from Takaragaike-dori Street in the north to the Niomon-dori Street (Nanzen-ji Temple).
It runs farther east than Higashioji-dori Street, extending from Takaragaike-dori Street in the north to Niomon-dori Street (Nanzen-ji Temple).
It runs farther east than Higashioji-dori Street, extending from Takaragaike-dori Street in the north to Niomon-dori Street (Nanzen-ji Temple).

sen.j: 鴨川 (淀川水系)支流の白川沿いを通る。
sen.e: It runs along the Shira-kawa River, a tributary of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system).
It runs along the Shira-kawa River, a tributary of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system).
It runs along the Shira-kawa River, a tributary of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system).

sen.j: 今出川通（銀閣寺道）から北山通（修学院道）にかけてイチョウとケヤキの街路樹がある。
sen.e: The section from Imadegawa-dori Street (Ginkakuji michi) to Kitayama-dori Street (Shugakuin-michi Street) is bordered with trees such as ginkgo and zelkova.
sen.cmt: http://www.kyotobus.jp/index.htmlhttp://web.kyoto-inet.or.jp/people/kurituka/torina.htmイチョウ 英辞郎 on the WEB
sen.e: The section from Imadegawa-dori Street (Ginkakuji michi) to Kitayama-dori Street (Shugakuin-michi Street) is bordered with trees such as ginkgo and zelkova.
The section from Imadegawa-dori Street (Ginkakuji michi) to Kitayama-dori Street (Shugakuin-michi Street) is bordered with trees such as ginkgo and zelkova.

sen.j: 沿道にはレストランやカフェ、ブティック、アンティークな店やエスニック料理店など北山通と並ぶファッションストリートとなっている。
sen.e: It is a fashionable street comparable to the Kitayama-dori Street, lined with restaurants, botiques, antique shops, and ethnic foods restaurants.
It is a fashionable street comparable to Kitayama-dori Street, lined with restaurants, botiques, antique shops, and ethnic foods restaurants.
It is a fashionable street comparable to Kitayama-dori Street, lined with restaurants, boutiques, antique shops, and ethnic foods restaurants.

sen.j: 通り沿いの上終町（かみはてちょう）には京都造形芸術大学があり、学生で賑わっている。
sen.e: Many students are found in the street, because Kyoto University of Art and Design is located along the street at Kamihatecho.
Many students are found in the street, because Kyoto University of Art and Design is located along the street at Kamihatecho.
Many students are found in the street, because Kyoto University of Art and Design is located along the street at Kamihatecho.

sen.j: また、北大路通付近から周辺には田畑も残っている。
sen.e: Agricutural fields still remain in areas north of are Kitaoji-dori Street.
Agricutural fields still remain in areas north of Kitaoji-dori Street.
Agricultural fields still remain in areas north of Kitaoji-dori Street.

sen.j: 宝ヶ池通より丸太町通との交点である東天王町までは4車線である。
sen.e: The section from Takaragaike-dori Street to the corssing with Marutamachi-dori Street, Higashi-tennocho, has 4 lanes. The 300-meter long section from Hanazonobashi Crossing to the bifurcation point with Kawabata-dori Street belongs to Nation Highway Route no. 367 and the section between the Kitaoji-dori Street and the Niomon-dori Street is Kyoto City Municipal Road No. 182 Keage-Takano-sen.

The section from Takaragaike-dori Street to the crossing with Marutamachi-dori Street, Higashi-tennocho, has 4 lanes. The 300-meter long section from Hanazonobashi Crossing to the bifurcation point with Kawabata-dori Street belongs to National Highway Route no. 367 and the section between Kitaoji-dori Street and Niomon-dori Street is Kyoto City Municipal Road No. 182 Keage-Takano-sen.
The section from Takaragaike-dori Street to the crossing with Marutamachi-dori Street, Higashi-tennocho, has 4 lanes.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処

sen.j: 花園橋交差点から宝ヶ池駅付近で川端通を分岐するまでの約300メートルの区間は国道367号、北大路通 - 仁王門通間は京都市道182号蹴上高野線となっている。
sen.e: The 300-meter long section from Hanazonobashi Crossing to the bifurcation point with Kawabata-dori Street around the Takaragaike Station belongs to National Highway Route no. 367 and the section between Kitaoji-dori Street and Niomon-dori Street is Kyoto City Municipal Road No. 182 Keage-Takano-sen.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処around the Takaragaike Station補足

sen.j: また、宝ヶ池駅南側にある叡山電鉄叡山本線との交差地点は自動車専用の立体交差が存在する。
sen.e: The intersection with Eizan Main Line, Eizan Electric Railway, south of Takaragaike Station, is a vehecle-only overpass.
The intersection with Eizan Main Line, Eizan Electric Railway, south of Takaragaike Station, is a vehicle-only overpass.
The intersection with Eizan Main Line, Eizan Electric Railway, south of Takaragaike Station, is a vehicle-only overpass.

sen.j: 丸太町通 - 仁王門通間は2車線で、春秋の観光シーズンには鹿ヶ谷通と共に南禅寺や永観堂への参拝客のタクシーや観光バスがひしめき合い、付近はしばしば渋滞となる。
sen.e: The section between the Marutamachi-dori Street and the Niomon-dori Street is a 2-lane street, which is just like the Shishigadani-dori Street, often corweded with taxis and sightseeing busses for visitors to Nanzenji Temple and Eikando in spring and autumn sightseeing seasons.

The section between the Marutamachi-dori Street and Niomon-dori Street is a 2-lane street, which is just like Shishigadani-dori Street, often crowded with taxis and sightseeing buses headed for Nanzenji Temple and Eikando during the spring and autumn sightseeing seasons.

The section between the Marutamachi-dori Street and Niomon-dori Street is a 2-lane street, which is just like Shishigadani-dori Street, often crowded with taxis and sightseeing buses headed for Nanzenji Temple and Eikando during the spring and autumn sightseeing seasons.

sen.j: 上側が北側、下側が南側。
sen.e: North is upper and south is lower.
The upper side is considered the northern portion, while the lower side is considered the southern portion.
The upper side is considered the northern portion, while the lower side is considered the southern portion.

sen.j: 左側が西側、右側が東側。
sen.e: West is left and east is right.
The left side is considered the western portion, while the right side is considered the east portion.
The left side is considered the western portion, while the right side is considered the east portion.

sen.j: 交差する道路の特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.

sen.j: 修学院離宮
sen.e: Shugakuin Imperial Villa

sen.e: Jisho-ji (Ginkaku-ji) Temple

sen.j: 天下一品総本店
sen.e: Main shop of Tenkaippin Ramen

sen.j: 白川を下った祇園にも白川通はある。
sen.e: Also, downstream of the Shira-kawa River, the streets having the name of Shirakawa-dori Street are found in Gion.
Also, downstream of the Shira-kawa River, streets having the name of Shirakawa-dori Street are found in Gion.
Also, downstream of the Shira-kawa River, streets having the name of Shirakawa-dori Street are found in Gion.

sen.j: 祇園での白川はクランク (道路)状に流れているため、東大路通と花見小路通間を東西に流れる白川沿いの通りが白川北通、祇園新橋から大和大路通までが白川南通に分かれている。
sen.e: There are 2 Shirakwa-dori Streets, because the Shira-kawa river takes a crank course in Gion and the stre; the street along the east-west running river between the Higashioji-dori Street and the Hanamikoji-dori Street is Shirakawa-kita-dori Street, while the street from Gion-shinbashi to the Yamato-oji-dori Street is the Shirakawa-minami-dori Street. There still remains the atmosphere of Old Gin in particular along the Shirakawa-minami-dori Street.

There are 2 Shirakwa-dori Streets, because the Shira-kawa river takes a crank course in Gion and the street along the east-west running river between Higashioji-dori Street and Hanamikoji-dori Street is Shirakawa-kita-dori Street, while the street from Gion-shinbashi to Yamato-oji-dori Street is Shirakawa-minami-dori Street. Notably, the atmosphere of Old Gion still remains along Shirakawa-minami-dori Street.

There are 2 Shirakwa-dori Streets, because the Shira-kawa river takes a crank course in Gion and the street along the east-west running river between Higashioji-dori Street and Hanamikoji-dori Street is Shirakawa-kita-dori Street, while the street from Gion-shinbashi to Yamato-oji-dori Street is Shirakawa-minami-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処

sen.j: 特に白川南通は昔の情緒が残っている。
sen.e: Notably, the atmosphere of Old Gion still remains along Shirakawa-minami-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
